about_the_game:
This is the game you open when you don't know what to eat today. The game will tell you what to do, then you go and cook it and eat it. Today. Every day. Now, you never need to decide again.

Press a button so we decide what you will eat today. No diets, no limits. We'll just throw something out there. Don't like it? Press the button again. 

Features:

  • Win credits by pressing the Decision Button

  • Buy secret recipes with the credits in the store

  • Discover secrets that will lead you down the rabbit's hole in the world of culinary

This was specifically made for people that can't cook or have no patience for it. So, if you want fancy recipes... Yeah, you're gonna be disappointed.

We also have a discord, I have no idea why: but hey. Here it is.

Thanks for playing and I hope we can help you decide what you're gonna eat from now... to the day you die.

Before you ask, yeah, we'll update with more stuff and types of food every week.

name: What Should I Eat

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Any modern dual-core processor (e.g., Intel i3 or equivalent)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics card such as Intel HD Graphics 4000 or equivalent
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Any modern dual-core processor (e.g., Intel i3 or equivalent)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics card such as Intel HD Graphics 4000 or equivalent
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound card

short_description: Not sure what to eat? Download this game and it will decide for you. Now you never have to spend another second trying to figure out what you'll eat today. And this is not a "healthy diet" game, so you also get pizza and hamburger.
